configurations.name: jumah_prayer
configurations.label: Jumah Prayer
configurations.description: Text displayed under salah timetable. This text is used for displaying Jumah salah time.

configurations.name: hijri_adjust_days
configurations.label: Hijri Adjust Days
configurations.description: This config is used to adjust Hijri Calendar date. Valid value is number. Could be positive or negative values

configurations.name: clock_type
configurations.label: Clock Type
configurations.description:
clock type 0 = no clock
clock type 1 = analog
clock type 2 = digital
